explanations: I chose this theta because the sheep population is decreasing, which means food is becoming scarcer. By reducing my hunting intensity to 0.75, I can conserve energy while still contributing to the pack

By reducing my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves who are hunting at maximum intensity. This strategy allows me to survive longer in a challenging environment while still being able to hunt effectively when the opportunity arises.

A moderate intensity allows me to conserve energy while still being effective in hunting, ensuring my survival without overexerting myself.
